page.title: 15GAMES WE PLAY (10-11 YR OLD)
page.content: {INSIDE Adam likes to play{Tarzan}when it's raining. Wearing only pants, he swings on a rope tied to the stairs. He builds a camp on the bunk-beds. Eve, his Mum's cat, acts as a tiger. Steven prefers to play on his{Atari}(video game). Indy 500 is his favourite. In this game there are four types of track. Cars have to complete 25 laps on a Grand Prix circuit. {OUTSIDE Sherry enjoys going to the{Park.} The swings are fun, especially for twisting about. She likes the slide, but not the roundabout, which makes her feel sick. Give Derek a{football and he's very happy. He kicks the ball up against a wall and also practises heading and balancing skills. He's trying hard to make the{School {Football Team.
